content: there are so many reasons i love earwarmers i love wearing them on days when i want my hair up but beyond that they re such a quick easy crochet project this one is particularly mindless because it s simply row of half_double_crochet in back loops only and finished with a beautiful twist that s much easier than it looks and if you re trying to build a craft fair inventory earwarmers can be a great addition tip choose just a handful of styles and work them up in several modern colors they re sure to sell but whether you re selling making christmas gifts or just making yourself something to feel beautiful in this pattern is for you
